source(output(
		payment_type as short,
		abbreviation as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> StagingPaymentType

		Borough as string,
		Zone as string,
		service_zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> StagingTaxiZone

		Trip_Month as string,
		Month_Name_Short as string,
		Month_Name_Full as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> StagingTripMonth
source(output(
		trip_type as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> StagingTripType
source(output(
		vendor_id as short,
		abbreviation as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> StagingVendor
source(output(
		rate_code_id as short,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> StagingRateCode

		payment_type as integer,
		abbreviation as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RawPaymentType

	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RawRateCode

		location_id as string,

		zone as string,

	format: 'parquet') ~> RawTripMonth

		trip_type as integer,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	format: 'parquet') ~> RawTripType
